description:
It was a dead-end alley, the far end of a cliff.

Louise had no choice but to do this.

Or because I have to marry a paedophile in a week. 

“Lord, you must exercise the right of night!”

I must be committed today.

To Cesare, the only lord of the countryside. 

“Wait, why are you taking your clothes off?”

“Well, that usually requires taking off your clothes to have a relationship, right?” 

The Lord likes not to take off his clothes.

It seems that he was a pervert who learned more than she expected.

That moment when I wanted to cry a little.

Chilling, zinging, zinging.

Three silver coins fell into the palm of my hand. 

“Why are you giving this to me?”

“Didn’t it say that rejection was two silver coins?” 

… … I will turn 

“Ah, one of my congratulations.” 

“no. I’ll take that blessing with my body. Lord. “>
